verses.verse: The word <S%H1697><s%> of Yahweh <S%H3068><s%> which came to Zephaniah, <S%H6846><s%> the son <S%H1121><s%> of Cushi, <S%H3570><s%> the son <S%H1121><s%> of Gedaliah, <S%H1436><s%> the son <S%H1121><s%> of Amariah, <S%H568><s%> the son <S%H1121><s%> of Hezekiah, <S%H2396><s%> in the days <S%H3117><s%> of Josiah, <S%H2977><s%> the son <S%H1121><s%> of Amon, <S%H526><s%> king <S%H4428><s%> of Judah. <S%H3063><s%>
I will utterly <S%H622><s%> sweep away <S%H5486><s%> everything off of the surface of the earth, <S%H6440><s%> says <S%H5002><s%> Yahweh. <S%H3068><s%>

I will sweep away <S%H5486><s%> man <S%H120><s%> and animal. <S%H929><s%> I will sweep away <S%H5486><s%> the birds <S%H5775><s%> of the sky, <S%H8064><s%> the fish <S%H1709><s%> of the sea, <S%H3220><s%> and the heaps <S%H4384><s%> of rubble with the wicked. <S%H7563><s%> I will cut off <S%H3772><s%> man <S%H120><s%> from <S%H6440><s%> the surface of the earth, <S%H127><s%> says <S%H5002><s%> Yahweh. <S%H3068><s%>

I will stretch out <S%H5186><s%> my hand <S%H3027><s%> against Judah, <S%H3063><s%> and against all the inhabitants <S%H3427><s%> of Jerusalem. <S%H3389><s%> I will cut off <S%H3772><s%> the remnant <S%H7605><s%> of Baal <S%H1168><s%> from this place: <S%H4725><s%> the name <S%H8034><s%> of the idolatrous <S%H3649><s%> and pagan priests, <S%H3548><s%>

those who worship <S%H7812><s%> the army <S%H6635><s%> of the sky <S%H8064><s%> on the housetops, <S%H1406><s%> those who worship <S%H7812><s%> and swear <S%H7650><s%> by Yahweh <S%H3068><s%> and also swear <S%H7650><s%> by Malcam, <S%H4428><s%>
those who have turned back <S%H5472><s%> from <S%H310><s%> following Yahweh, <S%H3068><s%> and those who haven't <S%H1245><s%> sought Yahweh <S%H3068><s%> nor inquired after him. <S%H1875><s%>

Be silent <S%H2013><s%> at the presence <S%H6440><s%> of the Lord <S%H136><s%> Yahweh, <S%H3068><s%> for the day <S%H3117><s%> of Yahweh <S%H3068><s%> is at hand. <S%H7138><s%> For Yahweh <S%H3068><s%> has prepared <S%H3559><s%> a sacrifice. <S%H2077><s%> He has consecrated <S%H6942><s%> his guests. <S%H7121><s%>

It will happen in the day <S%H3117><s%> of Yahweh <S%H3068><s%>'s sacrifice, <S%H2077><s%> that I will punish <S%H6485><s%> the princes, <S%H8269><s%> the king <S%H4428><s%>'s sons, <S%H1121><s%> and all those who are clothed <S%H3847><s%> with foreign <S%H5237><s%> clothing. <S%H4403><s%>

In that day, <S%H3117><s%> I will punish <S%H6485><s%> all those who leap <S%H1801><s%> over the threshold, <S%H4670><s%> who fill <S%H4390><s%> their master <S%H113><s%>'s house <S%H1004><s%> with violence <S%H2555><s%> and deceit. <S%H4820><s%>

In that day, <S%H3117><s%> says <S%H5002><s%> Yahweh, <S%H3068><s%> there will be the noise <S%H6963><s%> of a cry <S%H6818><s%> from the fish <S%H1709><s%> gate, <S%H8179><s%> a wailing <S%H3215><s%> from the second <S%H4932><s%> quarter, <S%H1419><s%> and a great crashing <S%H7667><s%> from the hills. <S%H1389><s%>

Wail, <S%H3213><s%> you inhabitants <S%H3427><s%> of Maktesh, <S%H4389><s%> for all the people <S%H5971><s%> of Canaan <S%H3667><s%> are undone! <S%H1820><s%> All those who were loaded <S%H5187><s%> with silver <S%H3701><s%> are cut off. <S%H3772><s%>

It will happen at that time, <S%H6256><s%> that I will search <S%H2664><s%> Jerusalem <S%H3389><s%> with lamps, <S%H5216><s%> and I will punish <S%H6485><s%> the men <S%H582><s%> who are settled <S%H7087><s%> on their dregs, <S%H8105><s%> who say <S%H559><s%> in their heart, <S%H3824><s%> "Yahweh <S%H3068><s%> will not do good, <S%H3190><s%> neither will he do evil. <S%H7489><s%>"

Their wealth <S%H2428><s%> will become a spoil, <S%H4933><s%> and their houses <S%H1004><s%> a desolation. <S%H8077><s%> Yes, <S%H1129><s%> they will build houses, <S%H1004><s%> but won't <S%H3427><s%> inhabit them. <S%H5193><s%> They will plant vineyards, <S%H3754><s%> but won't <S%H8354><s%> drink their wine. <S%H3196><s%>

The great <S%H1419><s%> day <S%H3117><s%> of Yahweh <S%H3068><s%> is near. <S%H7138><s%> It is near, <S%H7138><s%> and hurries <S%H4118><s%> greatly, <S%H3966><s%> the voice <S%H6963><s%> of the day <S%H3117><s%> of Yahweh. <S%H3068><s%> The mighty man <S%H1368><s%> cries <S%H6873><s%> there bitterly. <S%H4751><s%>

That day <S%H3117><s%> is a day <S%H3117><s%> of wrath, <S%H5678><s%> a day <S%H3117><s%> of distress <S%H4691><s%> and anguish, <S%H6869><s%> a day <S%H3117><s%> of trouble <S%H6869><s%> and ruin, <S%H4875><s%> a day <S%H3117><s%> of darkness <S%H2822><s%> and gloom, <S%H653><s%> a day <S%H3117><s%> of clouds <S%H6051><s%> and blackness, <S%H6205><s%>
a day <S%H3117><s%> of the trumpet <S%H7782><s%> and alarm, <S%H8643><s%> against the fortified <S%H1219><s%> cities, <S%H5892><s%> and against the high <S%H1364><s%> battlements. <S%H6438><s%>

I will bring distress <S%H6887><s%> on men, <S%H120><s%> that they will walk <S%H1980><s%> like blind men, <S%H5787><s%> because they have sinned <S%H2398><s%> against Yahweh, <S%H3068><s%> and their blood <S%H1818><s%> will be poured out <S%H8210><s%> like dust, <S%H6083><s%> and their flesh <S%H3894><s%> like dung. <S%H1561><s%>

Neither their silver <S%H3701><s%> nor their gold <S%H2091><s%> will be able <S%H3201><s%> to deliver <S%H5337><s%> them in the day <S%H3117><s%> of Yahweh <S%H3068><s%>'s wrath, <S%H5678><s%> but the whole land <S%H776><s%> will be devoured <S%H398><s%> by the fire <S%H784><s%> of his jealousy; <S%H7068><s%> for he will make <S%H6213><s%> an end, <S%H926><s%> yes, a terrible end, <S%H3617><s%> of all those who dwell <S%H3427><s%> in the land. <S%H776><s%>
